name: @entropi/surge-domain-sets
description: Surge RULE-SETs and DOMAIN-SETs for improving Surge functionality. Extends the built-in 'SYSTEM' RULE-SET which isn't very comprehensive, and also provides DOMAIN-SETS for blocking ads / trackers / malware, sourced from existing popular sources and ported to a format compatible with Surge
author: Ainsley <ainsley@entropi.hk>
